title:
Did anyone else in the local area (Topsail Island / Sneads Ferry) feel some kind of mild shaking around 2:30am on Friday night-Saturday morning, July 7? Usgs showed there was a mild earthquake off Puerto Rico around that time, but wouldn\'t NC be way too far away to actually feel any effect of that?

Thanks for your time.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=14871
